item.title: Links for June 29th through June 30th
item.dc:creator: Michael McCracken
item.description:
My shared links for June 29th through June 30th:

  • Daring Fireball: Simple Inbox Archiving Script for Apple Mail - From 2007, John Gruber's archiving applescript keeps his inbox clear of read, nonflagged items. (Apparently broken in Lion.) Sounds like this is manually invoked though. (update: it is.)

  • Time to bake smart correction tools into news platforms — Scott Rosenberg's Wordyard - Scott Rosenberg on how news CMSs need to include public-viewable change-tracking. One of those things that seems obvious for a programmer…
